Title: Imma contro tutti
Writer: Roberto Saviano (idea), Roberto Saviano (novel), Giovanni Bianconi (developer), Stefano Bises (developer), Leonardo Fasoli (developer), Ludovica Rampoldi (developer), Roberto Saviano (developer), Stefano Bises (story editor), Leonardo Fasoli (story), Filippo Gravino (teleplay)
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Fortunato Cerlino, Maria Pia Calzone, Salvatore Esposito
Plot: Pressure mounts for Imma as she gathers the colonels of the family to explain their new strategy.
